attributes.action: utterly condemn and bring all pressure possible to bear to prevent Cadbury from outsourcing production to Poland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cadbury used to pride itself on being a responsible, caring employer which looked after its staff at its beautiful Bourneville site. Their chocolate is a famous British brand and the British public have loyally supported Cadbury as a great British company for decades.

Today they still trade off that image but are now proposing to cut hundreds of British manufacturing jobs and outsource the work to a factory in Poland.

The petition seeks to urge the Prime Minister to condemn this in the strongest possible terms and being all pressure to bear upon Cadbury to reverse this decision.

I will be boycotting Cadbury until this decision to reversed.
